name: Solidary #StaySafeJam
description:
You can move around, and pickup the ring. That's as far as I got before I ran out of time.

The idea is that you would build solidarity  (The empty hearts on the side) by completing quests. The Queen misses her husband, but he can not return home without his wedding ring.

Move around with WASD keys. Confirm with Space or Enter.

Made with WebGL and JavaScript.

Source: https://github.com/ripter/staysafejam
